conversations.english: Hi, I'm Lucas, I just moved in next door.
conversations.chinese: 你好,我是卢卡斯,我刚搬到隔壁.
conversations.reply_english: Oh, hi Lucas, come on in. I'm Barbara. Nice to meet you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦,卢卡斯,请进,我是芭芭拉,很高兴认识你.

conversations.english: Hey. I'm a visitor from China. I love your music. It's the best I've ever heard. Will you please spare a little bit of time for me?
conversations.chinese: 嗨。我是从中国来的游客。我喜欢你的音乐。它是我所听到过的最棒的。你有时间跟我聊一会儿吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. Thank you for saying that. Actually, those songs were sung for the first time today. I wrote them in the past two months.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然。谢谢你喜欢。实际上，那些歌今天是第一次唱，是我在上两个月创作的。

title: 认识从纽约来的新朋友

conversations.english: Hey Michelle, this is my friend James. He' s visiting Shanghai from New York.
conversations.chinese: 米歇尔，这是我的朋友，詹姆斯。他从纽约来上海玩。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, hi James. Nice to meet you. So, uh, are you visiting for business or pleasure?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，詹姆斯你好。很高兴见到你。那你来这儿是办公还是游玩的？

conversations.english: Happy birthday? This is for you,Kate!
conversations.chinese: 生日快乐!凯特,这是送给你的.

title: 介绍认识来自巴西的同事

conversations.english: So, Michelle, let me introduce you to Maria. She' s my colleague from Brazil. Maria, this is Michelle.
conversations.chinese: 米歇尔，让我给你介绍玛莉亚给你认识。她是我来自巴西的同事。玛莉亚，这是米歇尔。
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Michelle. So what do you do here in Shanghai? I mean, what work do you do?
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，米歇尔。你来上海想做什么？我是说，你的工作是什么？

conversations.english: Hey, Kevin! Can I introduce you to my colleague? Kevin, this is Magee. Magee, Kevin.
conversations.chinese: 嗨，Kevin，我可以介绍你给我同事认识吗？Kevin，这是Magee. Magee, 这是Kevin.
conversations.reply_english: Hi Magee, I've heard a lot about you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，Magee，我听说了很多你的事。

conversations.english: Mr.Sherman, may I present Miss Marks?
conversations.reply_english: Nice to meet you, Mr. Sherman, I’m Elisabeth Marks.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很高兴认识你Sherman先生，我是Elisabeth Marks。

conversations.english: Oh,it's getting late. I've got to run. It was nice talking to you,karren.
conversations.chinese: 哦，很晚了，我得走了，很高兴跟你谈话，凯瑞。
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你，Tim.我也很高兴认识你。

conversations.english: Excuse me, are you Sara Willson?
conversations.chinese: 对不起，请问你是Sara Willson吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I am. You must be Tom. Nice to meet you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我是，你是Tom吧，很高兴认识你。
